entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 32.

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 34 with temperature rising to minus 29 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 34 with temperature rising to minus 29 by morning. Wind chill minus 45 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023
